Title: Data Scientist
Description:
We are looking for a talented Data scientist to join and change the world of advertising together, as we are developing the most sophisticated and intelligent AdExchange for our brands and publishers. Are you the one?




Who are we?




We are a scale-up in a üìà hyper-growth phase so we need to ensure that our product can scale up, and we need your üß† brain for this!




On the contextual side, by combining Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision, our proprietary Machine Learning-based technology provides a human-like understanding of the content of the web. We find the best context for each ad, while providing unparalleled risk-mitigation capabilities that protect advertisers from showing their ads on pages that could be damaging to their brand. All of this, without relying on cookies or any other tracking mechanisms.




On the AdExchange side, we are creating the most efficient exchange in the market by combining Optimization, Unsupervised, and Reinforcement Learning techniques. We put together the most valuable sources of demand and supply. From our Floor Strategy on the channel side to our Header Bidding solution at the preBid connector, the AdExchange becomes smarter every day.

We want you to üí° innovate and we have plenty of space for you to develop professionally!




As leaders of ‚öôÔ∏è Contextual Advertising Technologies; at Seedtag, our goal is to promote a better advertising industry where effective advertising respects users' privacy and experience.




Key Figures




2014 ¬∑ Founded

2018 ¬∑ 16M‚Ç¨ total turnover getting growth and going international

2021 ¬∑ Raised 40M‚Ç¨ , 230 Seedtaggers in 10 countries

2022 ¬∑ Raised 250M‚Ç¨ , expanding into the U.S market

üëâ 2024 ¬∑ Where will you bring us? üòé




What are our challenges?

‚Ä¶in numbers ü§Ø:

We handle more than 180 billion of events per day
We process on average 600,000 web pages per hour
Our CDN serves 1.5 petabytes every month to 200 million devices worldwide

So... it‚Äôs all about üèéÔ∏è speed and infrastructure reliance.

Your üòé mission (if you accept it) is to make our platform more intelligent.




Your Challenge: build the intelligence of our AdExchange

The AdExchange is the space where supply opportunities (ad slots) are matched to advertising demand items (ads). Just like the former trading pits in the stock market, opportunities to sell and buy are constantly created and resolved.




To make the most of this flow of monetization opportunities, we develop, train and deploy different Machine Learning models. At our AdExhange, you will find a myriad of use cases, each requiring different mathematical and infrastructure solutions. Our approach is strongly product-oriented, with a firm mathematical basis and proficient software development practices.




You will work close to the production environment and hand-to-hand with the team‚Äôs Data Scientists, MLOps and Data engineers, getting immediate feedback on the response of your solution. From your head to the cluster, you will have a barrier-free highway and a proactive team around you to support your work and ideas.




üöÄ This is a high-impact project that will shape the future of Seedtag.
üïµüèª You will work identifying, exploring, and making sense of data sources.
üßë‚Äçüíº You will partner closely with the Data component of our squad, to enhance the delivery of the intelligence into the AdExchange.
‚öôÔ∏è You will develop machine learning solutions to solve business problems: anomaly detection, price optimization, etc.
üíª You will develop and deploy production-oriented data software.




If you are up to the challenge and want to be a part of a talented and passionate team, we encourage you to apply for this position.




Our core values




üéØ Outcome over output

Our core tech values reflect our commitment to delivering exceptional results, fostering a culture of continuous learning, and always putting the customer's needs first. We believe that success comes from focusing on the outcomes rather than just the output. Our tech team aims to solve problems that make a meaningful difference, and we measure our success by the impact we have on the customer.




üí°Failure is allowed, learning is a must

We also recognize that failure is an inevitable part of the innovation process. Our team understands that setbacks are opportunities to learn and grow. We believe in testing early and often, and we continuously iterate and improve until we arrive at the best solution.




üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ We are all scouts

Another core value we hold is that we are all scouts. We believe in leaving things better than we found them. This means we take ownership of our work and strive to improve the systems and processes we touch. We encourage our team members to be proactive in identifying areas for improvement, and we value those who take the initiative to implement positive changes. Our goal is to leave a lasting, positive impact on our projects and our team.




üìä We are data-driven

Lastly, our team is data-driven. We believe that making informed decisions based on data is crucial to our success. Our engineering team uses data to guide our decision-making process and to identify opportunities for improvement. We are committed to using data to continuously monitor and optimize our systems and processes to ensure that we are delivering the best possible outcome for our customers.




How do we work?

Our modelling stack consists of a series of well-stablished Python frameworks such as Scikit Learn/Spacy/Torch/Tensorflow, but we embrace the adoption of new cool tools.

Our backend consists of a series of containerized (Docker) microservices built in Python, and deployed in a Kubernetes cluster.




Our MLOps infrastructure is built upon MLFlow and DVC to track, trace and register the models, the metrics, and the data. We love automatizing things, and our deployments are triggered via Jenkins for the code, and MLFlow for the models. Every service API we build is self-managed, so that you can fine-tune every detail of the serving process.




Our cloud infrastructure runs on Google Cloud. We store data in Redis, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, GCS, and other storage systems. We love kafka, event-based and data-streaming architecture models.




You Will Succeed If:

üöÄ You have 4-5 years of solid experience in data science and machine learning.
üßê You (preferentially) have a degree in computer science, engineering, statistics, mathematics, physics or another degree with a strong quantitative component.
üìêYou understand the theoretical functioning of the main algorithms in ML and you have experience applying these to real problems.
‚öôÔ∏è You care about producing maintainable code over time using good programming practices. you have experience in testing and with CI/CD tools.
üåü Nice to have: you have experience deploying models into production with docker and kubernetes. You are familiar with the MLOps universe.
üõ†Ô∏è You have ample experience with one or more of these machine learning tools: Scikit-learn, Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc.
ü§î You are a big-picture thinker who can see the forest and the trees. You have a strong understanding of the technical and business requirements of the projects you work on, and you can think strategically to ensure that your work aligns with the goals of the company.
üí° You are a problem solver who loves a good challenge. You are energized by tackling complex technical problems and figuring out creative solutions.
üìö You are a continuous learner who is passionate about your craft. You are committed to staying up-to-date with the latest developments in back-end engineering and are always looking for ways to improve your skills and knowledge.
ü§ù You are a strong communicator who can work effectively in a team. You are comfortable working collaboratively with others, and you are able to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
üèéÔ∏è You are adaptable and flexible. You are comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, and you are able to adjust to changing priorities and requirements.

If you possess these qualities and are excited about the opportunity to work on challenging, high-impact projects with a talented and passionate team, we encourage you to apply for this position.




What else is cool at Seedtag ?

üåè Unlimited work from home
‚åõ Excellent work/life balance
üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà Harassment-free, supportive and safe environment to ensure the healthiest and friendliest professional experience fostering diversity at all level
üíª Latest Macbook Pro + üè† 1,000‚Ç¨ for your home setup
üíº Mentoring and Career development with learning budget
üçΩÔ∏èüöòüë∂ Restaurant, transports and kindergarten tickets
üè• Medical insurance discounts

‚Ä¶ but there is more !

Free üá¨üáß English / üá™üá∏ Spanish / üá´üá∑ French lessons
üèâ Paid travel to our HQ in Madrid to gather with your teams

It's really a üöÄ key moment to jump in the bandwagon with us and join the Seedtag ü•æ adventure! If you are interested in joining one of the fastest growing üìà startups in Europe and work on massive scalability challenges, this is the place for you.

HTML:
We are looking for a talented Data scientist to join and change the world of advertising together, as we are developing the most sophisticated and intelligent AdExchange for our brands and publishers. Are you the one?


Who are we?


We are a scale-up in a üìà hyper-growth phase so we need to ensure that our product can scale up, and we need your üß† brain for this!


On the contextual side, by combining Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision, our proprietary Machine Learning-based technology provides a human-like understanding of the content of the web. We find the best context for each ad, while providing unparalleled risk-mitigation capabilities that protect advertisers from showing their ads on pages that could be damaging to their brand. All of this, without relying on cookies or any other tracking mechanisms.


On the AdExchange side, we are creating the most efficient exchange in the market by combining Optimization, Unsupervised, and Reinforcement Learning techniques. We put together the most valuable sources of demand and supply. From our Floor Strategy on the channel side to our Header Bidding solution at the preBid connector, the AdExchange becomes smarter every day.

We want you to üí° innovate and we have plenty of space for you to develop professionally!


As leaders of ‚öôÔ∏è Contextual Advertising Technologies; at Seedtag, our goal is to promote a better advertising industry where effective advertising respects users' privacy and experience.


Key Figures


2014 ¬∑ Founded

2018 ¬∑ 16M‚Ç¨ total turnover getting growth and going international

2021 ¬∑ Raised 40M‚Ç¨ , 230 Seedtaggers in 10 countries

2022 ¬∑ Raised 250M‚Ç¨ , expanding into the U.S market

üëâ 2024 ¬∑ Where will you bring us? üòé


What are our challenges?

‚Ä¶in numbers ü§Ø:

  • We handle more than 180 billion of events per day
  • We process on average 600,000 web pages per hour
  • Our CDN serves 1.5 petabytes every month to 200 million devices worldwide

So... it‚Äôs all about üèéÔ∏è speed and infrastructure reliance.

Your üòé mission (if you accept it) is to make our platform more intelligent.


Your Challenge: build the intelligence of our AdExchange

The AdExchange is the space where supply opportunities (ad slots) are matched to advertising demand items (ads). Just like the former trading pits in the stock market, opportunities to sell and buy are constantly created and resolved.


To make the most of this flow of monetization opportunities, we develop, train and deploy different Machine Learning models. At our AdExhange, you will find a myriad of use cases, each requiring different mathematical and infrastructure solutions. Our approach is strongly product-oriented, with a firm mathematical basis and proficient software development practices.


You will work close to the production environment and hand-to-hand with the team‚Äôs Data Scientists, MLOps and Data engineers, getting immediate feedback on the response of your solution. From your head to the cluster, you will have a barrier-free highway and a proactive team around you to support your work and ideas.


  • üöÄ This is a high-impact project that will shape the future of Seedtag.
  • üïµüèª You will work identifying, exploring, and making sense of data sources.
  • üßë‚Äçüíº You will partner closely with the Data component of our squad, to enhance the delivery of the intelligence into the AdExchange.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è You will develop machine learning solutions to solve business problems: anomaly detection, price optimization, etc.
  • üíª You will develop and deploy production-oriented data software.


If you are up to the challenge and want to be a part of a talented and passionate team, we encourage you to apply for this position.


Our core values


üéØ Outcome over output

Our core tech values reflect our commitment to delivering exceptional results, fostering a culture of continuous learning, and always putting the customer's needs first. We believe that success comes from focusing on the outcomes rather than just the output. Our tech team aims to solve problems that make a meaningful difference, and we measure our success by the impact we have on the customer.


üí°Failure is allowed, learning is a must

We also recognize that failure is an inevitable part of the innovation process. Our team understands that setbacks are opportunities to learn and grow. We believe in testing early and often, and we continuously iterate and improve until we arrive at the best solution.


üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ We are all scouts

Another core value we hold is that we are all scouts. We believe in leaving things better than we found them. This means we take ownership of our work and strive to improve the systems and processes we touch. We encourage our team members to be proactive in identifying areas for improvement, and we value those who take the initiative to implement positive changes. Our goal is to leave a lasting, positive impact on our projects and our team.


üìä We are data-driven

Lastly, our team is data-driven. We believe that making informed decisions based on data is crucial to our success. Our engineering team uses data to guide our decision-making process and to identify opportunities for improvement. We are committed to using data to continuously monitor and optimize our systems and processes to ensure that we are delivering the best possible outcome for our customers.


How do we work?

Our modelling stack consists of a series of well-stablished Python frameworks such as Scikit Learn/Spacy/Torch/Tensorflow, but we embrace the adoption of new cool tools.

Our backend consists of a series of containerized (Docker) microservices built in Python, and deployed in a Kubernetes cluster.


Our MLOps infrastructure is built upon MLFlow and DVC to track, trace and register the models, the metrics, and the data. We love automatizing things, and our deployments are triggered via Jenkins for the code, and MLFlow for the models. Every service API we build is self-managed, so that you can fine-tune every detail of the serving process.


Our cloud infrastructure runs on Google Cloud. We store data in Redis, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, GCS, and other storage systems. We love kafka, event-based and data-streaming architecture models.


You Will Succeed If:

  • üöÄ You have 4-5 years of solid experience in data science and machine learning.
  • üßê You (preferentially) have a degree in computer science, engineering, statistics, mathematics, physics or another degree with a strong quantitative component.
  • üìêYou understand the theoretical functioning of the main algorithms in ML and you have experience applying these to real problems.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è You care about producing maintainable code over time using good programming practices. you have experience in testing and with CI/CD tools.
  • üåü Nice to have: you have experience deploying models into production with docker and kubernetes. You are familiar with the MLOps universe.
  • üõ†Ô∏è You have ample experience with one or more of these machine learning tools: Scikit-learn, Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc.
  • ü§î You are a big-picture thinker who can see the forest and the trees. You have a strong understanding of the technical and business requirements of the projects you work on, and you can think strategically to ensure that your work aligns with the goals of the company.
  • üí° You are a problem solver who loves a good challenge. You are energized by tackling complex technical problems and figuring out creative solutions.
  • üìö You are a continuous learner who is passionate about your craft. You are committed to staying up-to-date with the latest developments in back-end engineering and are always looking for ways to improve your skills and knowledge.
  • ü§ù You are a strong communicator who can work effectively in a team. You are comfortable working collaboratively with others, and you are able to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • üèéÔ∏è You are adaptable and flexible. You are comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, and you are able to adjust to changing priorities and requirements.

If you possess these qualities and are excited about the opportunity to work on challenging, high-impact projects with a talented and passionate team, we encourage you to apply for this position.


What else is cool at Seedtag ?

  • üåè Unlimited work from home
  • ‚åõ Excellent work/life balance
  • üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà Harassment-free, supportive and safe environment to ensure the healthiest and friendliest professional experience fostering diversity at all level
  • üíª Latest Macbook Pro + üè† 1,000‚Ç¨ for your home setup
  • üíº Mentoring and Career development with learning budget
  • üçΩÔ∏èüöòüë∂ Restaurant, transports and kindergarten tickets
  • üè• Medical insurance discounts

‚Ä¶ but there is more !

  • Free üá¨üáß English / üá™üá∏ Spanish / üá´üá∑ French lessons
  • üèâ Paid travel to our HQ in Madrid to gather with your teams
  • ü•≥ Paid offsite meetup with your team, yearly company gathering,üéÑChristmas events‚Ä¶
  • üíØ "One Seedtag": a special award which allows you to work for a month from any of our open offices with paid travel and accommodation (think of Brazil, Mexico..., üèñ)


It's really a üöÄ key moment to jump in the bandwagon with us and join the Seedtag ü•æ adventure! If you are interested in joining one of the fastest growing üìà startups in Europe and work on massive scalability challenges, this is the place for you.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Would you like to join an international atmosphere and being involved in projects across Europe and with impact worldwide having the opportunity to consolidate your career? This is your opportunity!




We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team!




Data Scientist to support Advanced Analytics use cases in the area of aftersales products , with the end to end responsibility.




Understands data from a business and analytics point of view, finds out patterns and relationship in data, identifies methods for analysis and develops and performs data analysis.

Selects the appropriate tools, models, and methods for the data analysis.




Description of role and responsibilities:

Support the departments in the value creation and monetization of data-based solutions
Identify necessary data and are responsible for data collection and exploration, including data harmonization and preparation for internal and external partners
Identify and implement relevant use cases with customer added
Integrate analysis results and forecasts into relevant sales channels and applications
Work closely with the regional teams and support international rollouts of analytics solutions
Work with both external and internal teams to develop products




Education degree & experience

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Sc., Data Analytics or Information Technology. Bachelor in Engineering, Mathematics or a Quantitative Field.




Minimum 3 years‚Äô experience in Data Science, Machine Learning Tools and Algorithms.




Technical experience




Proficiency in Spark/Pyspark.
Extensive experience working with modeling libraries like Tensorflow, Sklearn, Statsmodels, Pytorch.
Experience creating, deploying and maintaining ML models.
Experience building data pipelines.
Proficiency in Python, SQL & Basic Unix Commands.
Experience with data visualization tools like Plotly, PowerBI, Tableau and others.
Experience with Model Explainability tools.
Profound experience in Databricks.
Experience in CI/CD
Kubernetes experience is valued.




Cloud Technologies

Experience developing and deploying solutions in Azure (Azure ML, VM ,Functions ,Storage, DevOps, etc.)
Experience in AWS (Lambdas, S3, EC2, Sagemaker) is highly valued.




Methodologies, Techniques & Others

Experience in Agile and Scrum.
High coding standards are also required.
Kanban, Scrumban or SAFe Experience is valued.




Business skills:

Strong critical thinking and problem solving skills.
Good written and oral communication skills.
Results-oriented, self-directed ability to drive change in an unstructured environment.
Time management skills.
International experience and multicultural skills are highly valued




English

Proficient in English, both written and spoken.
Knowledge of the German language is a plus.




Other Preferences

In addition to technical expertise, the ideal candidate should possess a set of vital soft skills for the role, including agility to swiftly adapt to evolving situations, a strong sense of empowerment, fostering trust and inspiration, a co-creative mindset that thrives on collaborative innovation, a relentless drive to excel and achieve success, unwavering customer orientation aimed at continually delighting our clients, a deep-rooted sense of purpose, a pioneering spirit that embraces innovation, and a commitment to continuous learning to stay at the forefront of industry advancements. All these skills are included as People Principles in the Mercedes-Benz career path for our continuous development.




We offer you the opportunity to grow in an international and dynamic environment, taking part in new projects.




Within our benefits as employee, we provide:

Competitive salary + variable compensation
60% Mobile work
Flexible entering hours
30 working days of holidays
Annual Training Plan
Mercedes-Benz benefits (Renting plans, employee discount)

Title: Data Scientist (Remote Spain)
Description:
At Intelygenz, we envision a future where processes accelerate performance. For the companies we work with, this means finding ways to optimize their data using cutting-edge technologies like AI-enabled automation. This mindset is a huge part of our culture. We thrive on pooling our skills, collaborating on projects, helping one another learn and creating innovations.




What are you going to do?

As a data scientist at Intelygenz, your day-to-day work will be organized in two principal lines: Industry and Laboratory.

At the Industry level, our main delivery is process automation. At this level, our artificial intelligence solutions are focused on automating processes to add business value to our customers. This approach is applied in many business sectors from NLP-based projects and advanced computer vision to multi-domain anomaly detection. A crucial step in the industrial process is the deployment of production-ready environments, their monitoring, and maintenance.

On the other hand, the goal of our laboratory is to research and test state-of-the-art techniques and solutions to keep improving our skills and to share our knowledge and proof of concepts with the community. Deep reinforcement learning, NLP revolutionary solutions (as Transformers or BERT), or Brain-Computer-Interface experiments are examples of our active research lines.




What will make you succeed in your role?‚úåÔ∏è:

Demonstrable knowledge of Mathematics and Statistics.
Minimum of two years experience in working on data-based projects.
Large experience with Python 3
Experience with cleaning tools and techniques, and data pre-processing.
Experience with libraries and frameworks like Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, PyTorch/Tensorflow.
Machine Learning knowledge
English Professional Competency.
Strong self-taught and proactivity capabilities.
Problem-solving and autonomy when facing new challenges.

Bonus Points:

Have a Computer Science background
Master's degree in Data Science or Artificial Intelligence.
Experience applying state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence techniques.
Large experience in software projects beyond data science.




After applying, what will the process be like?

üì≤ Firstly, you will start with an Initial Interview with the Talent Team.

‚å® Then, you will continue performing the technical assessment.

üíØ You will always get complete feedback about your performance.

üë´ If the feedback is positive, you will have a technical interview with a colleague.

üìñ Last but not least, the final stage will be an offer.




Why Intelygenz?

Salary rangeüí≤: 38.000-45.000‚Ç¨
100% Flexible üßëüèª‚Äçüíª

Flexible schedule and 100% freedom to work from anywhere you‚Äôd like (Spain-based)

Career Plan & Mentoring üöÄ

Specific career plans for horizontal and vertical growth plus mentoring to help you grow in your career. Let your motivations do the talking!

Unlimited Learning üìö

English classes, paid events, Udemy courses, and one hour per week to participate in continuous tech training programs with your co-workers. The sky is the limit!!

Always be yourself üëêüèΩ

Don't be afraid of who you are! You will feel embraced and supported by the team and the whole company.

Physical&Mental Health üí™üèΩ

Get a refund up to 80% on your sessions with a Nutritionist, Psychologist, and Physiotherapist! üßò

Happy Hours... ‚ù§Ô∏è

... and an Intelygenz Anniversary exclusive T-shirt

Home Office Budget
Operating System of your choice
Flexible retribution - restaurant, transport, and nursery
50% of health insurance coverage

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About the Role:




Dow Jones is seeking a skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join our AI Engineering Team. You will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining machine learning pipelines and infrastructure, supporting both conventional and GenAI models. You will collaborate with our data scientists to seamlessly integrate various machine learning models, including large language models (LLMs).




As a key team member, you will play a crucial role in operationalizing machine learning solutions to meet our organization's needs and deliver tangible value. You will leverage your strong software engineering skills to develop robust, secure, and scalable production systems, utilizing your expertise in machine learning algorithms and techniques.




You Will:




Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to integrate ML models into various AI/ML pipelines, covering pre-processing, fine-tuning, and deployment.
Implement optimized data storage and indexing systems for NLP, utilizing advanced database technologies.
Develop tools and frameworks for model training, tuning, and evaluation, ensuring seamless infrastructure integration.
Partner with data scientists and engineers to integrate models into production, leveraging cloud infrastructure as needed.
Monitor and improve model performance for accuracy and efficiency.
Provide ongoing support, troubleshoot issues, and implement updates for ML models.
Build and maintain data processing pipelines for high volumes of structured and unstructured data.
Develop and maintain documentation for all ML infrastructure and support processes.
Stay updated on GenAI, NLP, ML, and IR technologies, incorporating best practices and leveraging cloud infrastructure for efficiency.

You Have:




Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or a related STEM field.
At least 3 years of industrial experience in a machine learning engineering, data science or data engineering role.
Proven programming skills in Python and/or another high-level language commonly used in machine learning.
Familiarity with NLP and Machine Learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., PyTorch, HuggingFace, LangChain, spaCy, NLTK, scikit-learn, etc.).
Experience in developing and managing NLP-focused data infrastructure, including storage, indexing, and retrieval systems.
Familiarity with cloud-based infrastructure and services (e.g., AWS, GCP, etc.).
Familiarity with containerization and orchestration technologies, such as Docker and Kubernetes, on cloud-based infrastructure.
Experience with version control systems such as Git.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, and a passion for working as part of a team.




Our Benefits:




Comprehensive Healthcare Plans
Paid Time Off
Retirement Plans
Comprehensive Insurance Plans
Lifestyle programs & Wellness Resources
Education Benefits
Family Care Benefits & Caregiving Support
Commuter Transit Program
Subscription Discounts
Employee Referral Program

Title: Junior Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Description:
We are expanding our development teams and although we don't care much about titles, we call this role Artificial Intelligence Engineer.

As an Artificial Intelligence Engineer, you will be part our Artificial Intelligence team developing tailored solutions to satisfy our client's needs. We are looking for a passionate AI Engineer eager to learn and grow in the area.

You will be part of a multidisciplinary team, taking care of the software engineering challenges associated with AI. You will take part in challenging projects using cutting edge technologies.

Our vision is to build multidisciplinary teams which directly manage projects in an AGILE way to find and implement the best solutions üòä

You will be responsible for:


Participating in the design and development of AI solutions for challenging projects
Building production level ML/AI solutions, with solid software engineering and ML/AI principles
MLOps
Automated deployment and monitoring (models and infrastructure)
Data analysis (data cleaning, variable transformation, etc.)
Developing and training ML models
Putting AI models into production. This means parallelizing, optimizing, tuning, testing the models to deploy in a production environment



Requirements

What are we looking for?


At least two years of experience in AI / Machine Learning / Computer Science
Python and SQL understanding
Experience working with Azure or other cloud-based solution
Knowlege about building ML/deep learning pipelines and models
Experience/knowlege with Deep learning/ML frameworks like pandas, scikit-learn, Pytorch, Tensorflow, etc
Experience with source code version control tools



Nice to have:


Experience/Knowlege with DevOps technology (Docker, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment, etc.)



Benefits

What do we offer?


Salary determined by the market and your experience ü§ë
Flexible schedule 35 Hours / Week üòé (1 year trial period)
Fully remote work (optional) üåç
Flexible compensation (restaurant, transport, and childcare) ‚úå
Medical and dental insurance (completely free of charge for the employee) üöë
Individual budget for training and free Microsoft certifications üìö
English lessons (1 hour/week) üóΩ
Birthday day off üå¥ü•≥
Monthly bonus for electricity and Internet expenses at home üíª
Discount on gym plan and sports activities üîù
Plain Camp (annual team-building event) üé™
‚ûï The pleasure of always working with the latest technological tools!


With all this information you already know a lot about us. Will you let us know you better?

The selection process? Simple, just 3 steps: a call and 2 interviews with the team ü§ò

And you may wonder... Who is Plain Concepts?

Plain Concepts is made up of 400 people who are passionate about technology, driven by the change towards finding the best solutions for our customers and projects.

Throughout the years, the company has grown thanks to the great technical potential we have and relying on our craziest and most innovative ideas. We currently have over 14 offices in 6 different countries. Our main goal is to keep growing as a team, developing the best and most advanced projects in the market.

We truly believe in the importance of bringing together people from different backgrounds and countries to build the best team, with a diverse and inclusive culture.

What do we do at Plain Concepts?

We are characterized for having a DNA 100% technical. We develop customized projects from scratch, technical consultancy, and training.


We don't do bodyshopping or outsourcing
Our teams are multidisciplinary, and the organizational structure is flat and horizontal
We are very committed to AGILE values
Sharing is caring: We help, support, and encourage each other to expand our knowledge internally and also towards the community (with conferences, events, talks...)
We always look for creativity and innovation, even when the idea might seem crazy to others
Transparency is key to any relationship


To know more about us, take a look in our website:

‚û° https://www.plainconcepts.com/case-studies/

At Plain Concepts, we certainly seek to provide equal opportunities. We want diverse applicants regardless of race, colour, gender, religion, national origin, citizenship, disability, age, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist

Any location within Spain

Hybrid/Remote way of working




Would you like to influence our human centric corporate culture by joining an innovative project reinforcing the management and evolution of products/projects in the Sustainability and Financial Sectors? Do you enjoy working in Big Data and Advanced Analytics initiatives that solve real world problems? If so, we are looking for you to join our CoE in Analytics & Big Data in Spain!




In the CoE of Advanced Analytics in Fujitsu we are currently looking for a Data Scientist to continue the growth of our team, leverage our product portfolio, and develop new data driven solutions by innovation through investigation.




As our future Data Scientist:




You will be focused on explainability, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Machine Learning. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to innovate and contribute to research in the field of Data Science by:




Assessing the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.
Developing processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.
Identifying patterns, trends, and significant relationships within data.
Building custom data models and algorithms to support the business.
Using predictive modeling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting, and other business outcomes.
Using advanced NLP techniques to extract relevant information from unstructured text.
Researching and developing methods to strengthen the current models.
Sharing investigation findings clearly and understandably with non-technical stakeholders.
Coordinating with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.
Keeping up to date with the latest trends in Data Science and emerging technologies to propose creative and efficient solutions for specific challenges.




Your profile




You have a Degree, Master‚Äôs and/or a PhD preferably in Computer Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics, or another quantitative field, and a minimum of 3 years of experience working preferably within the IT Consultancy industry.




Strong problem-solving skills with an emphasis on product development and innovation.
Solid experience in NLP, explainable AI, and predictive modeling.
Experience using statistical computer languages (Python, R, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.
Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.
Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests, proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.
Capability to produce optimized and efficient production code.
Knowledge of cloud platforms such as Azure and/or AWS is a plus
A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.




You are curious by nature and were born with an analytical mind and a self-motivation that urges you to strive for results and find creative solutions. Besides having excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams, you are also fluent both in Spanish and English.




Shape your world and achieve together




We want the best people on our team, so we welcome and encourage applications from people with a diverse variety of experiences, backgrounds, and identities. We are committed to equality of opportunity for all. If you want to work alongside people with different ideas, in an inclusive business, that will welcome you and support you, come and co-create the future at Fujitsu.




What is in it for you?




When you join our team, we offer you an attractive salary and secondary benefits, including a variable bonus scheme. You will get the opportunity to work in a flexible environment, with flexible working times, great social benefits, lots of room for personal growth, additional training possibilities, and the opportunity to expand your career internationally while working for an employer awarded the Great Place to Work Certification.




About Fujitsu




Since being founded in Japan in 1935, we have continued to demonstrate our technological prowess and the persistent pursuit of innovation. As a world-leading digital transformation partner, our business structure is aligned with the modern digital world. We use our experience and the power of IT to shape the future of society with our customers.




More information: www.fujitsu.com

Title: Machine Learning Developer
Description:
Desde Serem, nos encontramos en la b√∫squeda de DESARROLLADOR DE MACHINE LEARNING Y DEEP LEARNING con al menos 3 a√±os de experiencia para importante proyecto en modalidad remota.

- Implementar y optimizar redes neuronales profundas utilizando marcos como TensorFlow, PyTorch y Keras.

- Computaci√≥n en la nube:

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, and more freedom. Since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. Our powerhouse of products ‚Äî including spending, saving, investing, exchanging, travelling, and more ‚Äî help our 45+ million customers get more from their money every day.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,‚Äå 2 things are essential to our success: our people and our culture. In recognition of our outstanding employee experience, we've been certified as a Great Place to Work‚Ñ¢. So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our offices and remotely, to help us achieve our mission. And we're looking for more brilliant people. People who love building great products, redefining success, and turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

We approach Data Science at Revolut the same way that we approach everything else ‚Äì with class, logical thinking and lots of style üòé Let‚Äôs break it down: we take the most complex problems and create tailor-made solutions for our customers üöÄ If you‚Äôre thinking the Data team is kept in some sort of a secret den, doomed to never see the impact of their work, don‚Äôt worry - that‚Äôs not how we do things. They‚Äôre some of our best and brightest problem-solvers, deployed to the front lines to work in product teams and deliver rockstar solutions ü§ò

We start with deep data analysis to understand our customers, their objectives and any issues they might have. We then use various data points and advanced machine learning algorithms, to come up with the best possible option for each client. We experiment, iterate and build fully automated solutions, based on algorithms which self-improve with time.

We‚Äôre looking for next-level Data Scientists to board our FinTech rocket ship and shape the future of financial services apps. Phew! It‚Äôs a big task, but you won‚Äôt do it alone. üí™

You‚Äôll be working with the toughest and most gifted professionals in Product, Design, Data Science and Engineering, on impactful projects that‚Äôll make our company move forward ‚è©

What You‚Äôll Be Doing


Improving existing algorithms and building new Proofs of Concept
Delivering real impact to the product through rigorous data-driven solutions
Researching and then delivering PoCs into data products
Collaborating with product owners, engineers and data scientists to continually solve complex data problems


What You'll Need


Experience building and leading a significant data science team within a scaling organisation
Bachelor's/Master's/PhD in STEM (Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering)
Excellent knowledge of data science tools, including, python coding, SQL and production tools.
Deep understanding of fundamentals of probability and statistics.
Big picture thinking - correctly diagnosing problems and productionising research.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to partner with Product Owners and business heads


Nice to have


Advanced degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., Masters or PhD)
Strong experience with additional programming languages (such as: Java, Scala, C++‚Ä¶)
Previous experience in anti fraud departments
Experience working at a large tech company worth >$15B
School/University Olympic medal competitions in: Physics, Maths, Economics or Programming


Building a global financial super app isn‚Äôt enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that‚Äôs why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We‚Äôre doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That‚Äôs why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
We are expanding our development teams and although we don't care much about titles, we call this role Data Scientist.

As an Data Scientist Engineer, you will be part our international AI/ML team developing tailored solutions to satisfy our client's needs. We are looking for a passionate AI Engineer with background in machine/deep learning. You will be training, and deploying models, putting research into production, among other tasks.

You will be part of a multidisciplinary team, taking care of the software engineering challenges associated with AI. You will take part in challenging projects using cutting edge technologies. You will work in an international environment with the possibility of working from home or from our offices.

Our vision is to build multidisciplinary teams which directly manage projects in an AGILE way to find and implement the best solutions üòä

You will be responsible for:


Participating in the design and development of AI solutions for challenging projects
Building production level ML/AI solutions, with solid software engineering and ML/AI principles
MLOps
Automated deployment and monitoring (models and infrastructure)
Data analysis (data cleaning, variable transformation, etc.)
Developing and training ML models
Putting AI models into production. This means parallelizing, optimizing, tuning, testing the models to deploy in a production environment



Requirements

What are we looking for?


More than 5 years of experience in AI / Machine Learning / Computer Science
Can build an "end-to-end software product" which has machine learning component
Knowledges in applied computer vision.
Strong skills in Python and reasonable SQL understanding
Experience in building ML/deep learning pipelines and models
Experience in implementing production ready ML models using current ML/Deep learning techniques
MLOps experience is very valuable for the team
Experience in projects with NLP is neccesary


Very nice to have:


Experience with Deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow, PyTorch etc
Experience with Big Data projects and tools
Experience writing RESTful web services
Experience with DevOps technology (Docker, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment, etc.)
Experience with source code version control tools
Experience working with Azure or other cloud-based solution
Azure Machine Learning: Experience with Azure Machine Learning is a plus, although not essential
Deep learning and neural networks. Expertise in deep learning and high-level neural networks.
Experience with one or more of the following: Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision, recommendation systems, unsupervised learning, ranking systems or similar.
TensorFlow Lite, TensorFlow serving y grpc
Unit testing knowledge
Solid object-oriented programming skills



Benefits

What do we offer?


Salary determined by the market and your experience ü§ë
Flexible schedule 35 Hours / Week üòé
Fully remote work (optional) üåç
Flexible compensation (restaurant, transport, and childcare) ‚úå
Medical and dental insurance (completely free of charge for the employee) üöë
Individual budget for training and free Microsoft certifications üìö
English lessons (1 hour/week) üóΩ
Birthday day off üå¥ü•≥
Monthly bonus for electricity and Internet expenses at home üíª
Discount on gym plan and sports activities üîù
Plain Camp (annual team-building event) üé™
‚ûï The pleasure of always working with the latest technological tools!


With all this information you already know a lot about us. Will you let us know you better?

The selection process? Simple, just 3 steps: a call and 2 interviews with the team ü§ò

And you may wonder... Who is Plain Concepts?

Plain Concepts is made up of 400 people who are passionate about technology, driven by the change towards finding the best solutions for our customers and projects.

Throughout the years, the company has grown thanks to the great technical potential we have and relying on our craziest and most innovative ideas. We currently have over 14 offices in 6 different countries. Our main goal is to keep growing as a team, developing the best and most advanced projects in the market.

We truly believe in the importance of bringing together people from different backgrounds and countries to build the best team, with a diverse and inclusive culture.

What do we do at Plain Concepts?

We are characterized for having a DNA 100% technical. We develop customized projects from scratch, technical consultancy and training.


We don't do bodyshopping or outsourcing
Our teams are multidisciplinary, and the organizational structure is flat and horizontal
We are very committed to AGILE values
Sharing is caring: We help, support, and encourage each other to expand our knowledge internally and also towards the community (with conferences, events, talks...)
We always look for creativity and innovation, even when the idea might seem crazy to others
Transparency is key to any relationship


To know more about us, take a look in our website:

‚û° https://www.plainconcepts.com/case-studies/

At Plain Concepts, we certainly seek to provide equal opportunities. We want diverse applicants regardless of race, colour, gender, religion, national origin, citizenship, disability, age, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Title: AI Data Scientist
Description:
At Tenth Revolution, we collaborate with a leading global multinational company in their sector.

We attract, develop, and grow passionate individuals who will significantly impact the digital future of our partners. Join us and be a part of our digital transformation journey.




Objective of the Position




We are looking for a talented Data Scientist specializing in Generative AI to develop a GenAI-driven application that enhances decision-making processes.




In this role, you will:

Engage in discussions about data analytics, AI, and Generative AI features with users, converting business requirements into technical concepts for Generative AI and ML engineering.
Utilize deep knowledge of data engineering to relate data to user decision-making situations.
Plan user experiences and guide data engineers and scientists to fully embrace these experiences.
Collaborate with global and regional units, as well as external partners.
Assist in the transition from project phases to successful operations, incorporating Generative AI features.




Main Tasks

Work closely with project team members and stakeholders to understand the background and business requirements of each party and provide consulting on their activities.
Translate business requirements into technical concepts, focusing on data science and ML engineering within GenAI architecture frameworks.
Data preparation
Utilizing enterprise data product concepts
Addressing data science aspects
Implementing high-performance GenAI functionalities
Create and maintain product requirement documents in an agile working environment, using tools such as Azure DevOps boards and tasks.
Operate in an international and agile DevOps environment, applying agile principles to set priorities and manage multiple stakeholders in a dynamic business setting.
Share knowledge and expertise with colleagues, promoting a culture of AI-driven innovation within the organization.
Manage communication with external vendors to validate landscape design and integration concepts.




Job Requirements




Technical & Professional Knowledge (Mandatory):




At least 4 years of experience in data science or AI, utilizing Microsoft Azure cloud components for ML and Data Science, such as Databricks and Azure Data Factory.
Experience integrating external data into MLOps frameworks.
Hands-on experience developing GenAI-based chatbots.
Experience working with large data sets, relational databases, data integration, and related technologies (e.g., SQL, Databricks).
Expert knowledge of Python, focusing on machine learning and data science libraries (e.g., Pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Hands-on experience with MLOps processes (CI/CD) and automating ML workflows (Microsoft Azure or other platforms).
Experience with software development for cloud-based applications in an agile setup (e.g., Kanban, Scrum).
Strong interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills in English.




Technical & Professional Knowledge (Additional Plus/Nice to Have):

Proven track record of successful AI-driven projects, preferably in an industrial setting.
Experience with GenAI technology
Experience in supply chain management or planning.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Keysight is on the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights to the world‚Äôs visionaries and innovators in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our ~15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Our technical solutions ‚Äì and our methods for creating them ‚Äì help connect and secure the world. Learn more about what we do and how we do it.




About the Team:

Join Keysight's central AI team in Barcelona, a newly formed division dedicated to innovation and excellence in machine learning. As we build this new team from the ground up, you will have a unique opportunity to shape the future of our AI initiatives and make a significant impact from day one. Our team is a hub of innovation where top-tier researchers and engineers collaborate to create cutting-edge ML technologies that power our world-class products and services.




We are at the forefront of AI research, driving advancements in supervised and unsupervised learning, generative models, temporal learning, multimodal input streams, deep reinforcement learning, inverse reinforcement learning, and large language models. At Keysight, we are passionate about pushing the boundaries of what is possible. Our mission is to develop transformative ML solutions that address real-world, large-scale problems, ensuring our products lead the industry in performance and reliability.




As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to work on pioneering projects, develop state-of-the-art algorithms, and contribute to the evolution of technologies that enable the next generation of design and test products, including those for the 6G era. We foster a dynamic and collaborative environment where innovation thrives, and every team member's contribution is valued. Our cross-functional teams work closely to integrate AI/ML solutions seamlessly into our products, ensuring that we meet and exceed the needs of our customers.




If you are driven by curiosity, inspired by challenges, and ready to make a significant impact, Keysight's central AI team is the place for you.




About the Role:

We are seeking highly qualified individuals to join our newly build AI-team as Machine Learning Engineers.




Specifically, we are looking for people with expertise in 3 areas:




1) Transformers, Generative AI, Large Language Models.

2) Machine Learning/ Deep Learning i the field of Telecommunications and Networking.

3) Pytorch experts with experience with model optimization techniques and training parallelism paradigms.




We are dedicated to research and development in the field of machine learning within the design and test industry. As part of the team, you will have the opportunity to be the first to work on some of the most challenging technical problems and develop innovative ML solutions that will influence the future of Keysight‚Äôs products and business operations.




You'll be developing innovative ML solutions for our next-generation design and test products, enabling 6G. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams across Keysight to ensure that the AI/ML solutions are seamlessly integrated within our products.




We're looking for someone who is self-motivated, thrives in dynamic environments, quickly builds relationships, and adapts to change and ambiguity. Strong programming skills and experience crafting, prototyping, and delivering sophisticated algorithmic solutions are essential.




Responsibilities:

Work with large datasets; extract and manipulate data using tools such as Spark SQL, command line, and scripting languages.
Design, develop, validate, and maintain predictive models and pipelines using the latest machine learning technologies.
Implement and deploy machine learning models to improve business metrics.
Develop tools to enhance the development, deployment, and lifecycle of machine learning models.
Collaborate with stakeholders, including customers and internal teams, to ensure alignment and success.
Understand and prioritize customer needs, conveying this urgency to product development teams.
Inspire and challenge development teams to achieve high performance sustainably.







Required Qualifications:

Master‚Äôs degree with 1-3 years of experience or PhD degree
In-depth knowledge of deep learning (DL) and statistical machine learning (ML)
Strong understanding of predictive modeling and machine learning algorithms (supervised and unsupervised learning, classification, regression, clustering, CNN/RNN/LSTM/Transformer, etc.)
Proficiency in programming with Python and C++
Hands-on experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch







Desired Qualifications:

Experience with the complete MLOps workflow, including data platforms, training infrastructure, and edge deployment
Passion for developing intuitive, maintainable, and well-documented software tools/apps
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, meet tight deadlines, and independently explore new ideas to improve Keysight products and operations
Creative and collaborative mindset
Strong verbal and written communication skills







What we offer:

A place within an exciting company! At Keysight we develop with our visionary, market-leading, and highly innovative customers breakthroughs that connect and secure the world. We offer you a highly competitive package. See our culture and our Benefits.







At Keysight, Inclusion, Equity & Diversity is an integral part of our core values. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers. We believe everyone should be respected in the workplace and in their communities regardless of race, color, age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, ethnicity, religion, disability, veteran status, national origin, or any protected class. We continuously challenge ourselves to grow in our understanding of inclusion by engaging in a wide variety of diversity programs, initiatives, employee network groups and mentoring/development. This is Keysight ‚Äì People and Culture - Youtube.

HTML:
Keysight is on the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights to the world‚Äôs visionaries and innovators in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our ~15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Our technical solutions ‚Äì and our methods for creating them ‚Äì help connect and secure the world. Learn more about what we do and how we do it.


About the Team:

Join Keysight's central AI team in Barcelona, a newly formed division dedicated to innovation and excellence in machine learning. As we build this new team from the ground up, you will have a unique opportunity to shape the future of our AI initiatives and make a significant impact from day one. Our team is a hub of innovation where top-tier researchers and engineers collaborate to create cutting-edge ML technologies that power our world-class products and services.


We are at the forefront of AI research, driving advancements in supervised and unsupervised learning, generative models, temporal learning, multimodal input streams, deep reinforcement learning, inverse reinforcement learning, and large language models. At Keysight, we are passionate about pushing the boundaries of what is possible. Our mission is to develop transformative ML solutions that address real-world, large-scale problems, ensuring our products lead the industry in performance and reliability.


As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to work on pioneering projects, develop state-of-the-art algorithms, and contribute to the evolution of technologies that enable the next generation of design and test products, including those for the 6G era. We foster a dynamic and collaborative environment where innovation thrives, and every team member's contribution is valued. Our cross-functional teams work closely to integrate AI/ML solutions seamlessly into our products, ensuring that we meet and exceed the needs of our customers.


If you are driven by curiosity, inspired by challenges, and ready to make a significant impact, Keysight's central AI team is the place for you.


About the Role:

We are seeking highly qualified individuals to join our newly build AI-team as Machine Learning Engineers.


Specifically, we are looking for people with expertise in 3 areas:


1) Transformers, Generative AI, Large Language Models.

2) Machine Learning/ Deep Learning i the field of Telecommunications and Networking.

3) Pytorch experts with experience with model optimization techniques and training parallelism paradigms.


We are dedicated to research and development in the field of machine learning within the design and test industry. As part of the team, you will have the opportunity to be the first to work on some of the most challenging technical problems and develop innovative ML solutions that will influence the future of Keysight‚Äôs products and business operations.


You'll be developing innovative ML solutions for our next-generation design and test products, enabling 6G. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams across Keysight to ensure that the AI/ML solutions are seamlessly integrated within our products.


We're looking for someone who is self-motivated, thrives in dynamic environments, quickly builds relationships, and adapts to change and ambiguity. Strong programming skills and experience crafting, prototyping, and delivering sophisticated algorithmic solutions are essential.


Responsibilities:

  • Work with large datasets; extract and manipulate data using tools such as Spark SQL, command line, and scripting languages.
  • Design, develop, validate, and maintain predictive models and pipelines using the latest machine learning technologies.
  • Implement and deploy machine learning models to improve business metrics.
  • Develop tools to enhance the development, deployment, and lifecycle of machine learning models.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders, including customers and internal teams, to ensure alignment and success.
  • Understand and prioritize customer needs, conveying this urgency to product development teams.
  • Inspire and challenge development teams to achieve high performance sustainably.



Required Qualifications:

  • Master‚Äôs degree with 1-3 years of experience or PhD degree
  • In-depth knowledge of deep learning (DL) and statistical machine learning (ML)
  • Strong understanding of predictive modeling and machine learning algorithms (supervised and unsupervised learning, classification, regression, clustering, CNN/RNN/LSTM/Transformer, etc.)
  • Proficiency in programming with Python and C++
  • Hands-on experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch



Desired Qualifications:

  • Experience with the complete MLOps workflow, including data platforms, training infrastructure, and edge deployment
  • Passion for developing intuitive, maintainable, and well-documented software tools/apps
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, meet tight deadlines, and independently explore new ideas to improve Keysight products and operations
  • Creative and collaborative mindset
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills



What we offer:

A place within an exciting company! At Keysight we develop with our visionary, market-leading, and highly innovative customers breakthroughs that connect and secure the world. We offer you a highly competitive package. See our culture and our Benefits.



At Keysight, Inclusion, Equity & Diversity is an integral part of our core values. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers. We believe everyone should be respected in the workplace and in their communities regardless of race, color, age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, ethnicity, religion, disability, veteran status, national origin, or any protected class. We continuously challenge ourselves to grow in our understanding of inclusion by engaging in a wide variety of diversity programs, initiatives, employee network groups and mentoring/development. This is Keysight ‚Äì People and Culture - Youtube.

Title: Data Scientist
Place: Pozuelo de Alarc√≥n, Community of Madrid, Spain
Description:
Sobre Zertia




Zertia es una startup pionera en la gesti√≥n de los riesgos asociados con el uso de modelos de Inteligencia Artificial en las empresas, aplicando una metodolog√≠a exclusiva concebida con l√≠deres en investigaci√≥n de IA. Simult√°neamente, las certificaciones de Zertia se adhieren a los est√°ndares internacionales ISO y las certificaciones IEEE. Zertia asegura el cumplimiento normativo y la conformidad con los est√°ndares internacionales en la aplicaci√≥n de la Inteligencia Artificial.




¬øQu√© buscamos?




Estamos en la b√∫squeda de un Data Scientist apasionado y experimentado para unirse a nuestro equipo en una etapa cr√≠tica de crecimiento. El candidato ideal ser√° un l√≠der visionario con una s√≥lida experiencia en ciencia de datos y un profundo conocimiento de las regulaciones de IA. Este rol es fundamental para el desarrollo de nuestros productos principales: modelos de evaluaci√≥n de la conformidad y certificaci√≥n que puedan aplicarse a modelos de IA en m√∫ltiples industrias y sean escalables.




Responsabilidades:




‚Ä¢ Desarrollo de Productos: Dise√±ar y desarrollar modelos de evaluaci√≥n de la conformidad y certificaci√≥n de IA que cumplan con las normativas del EU IA Act y otras regulaciones y normas internacionales en la materia.

‚Ä¢ Liderazgo T√©cnico: Dirigir y gestionar el equipo de ciencia de datos, promoviendo la innovaci√≥n y el desarrollo de soluciones tecnol√≥gicas avanzadas.

‚Ä¢ Colaboraci√≥n Multidisciplinar: Trabajar estrechamente con los equipos de producto, regulaci√≥n y tecnolog√≠a, as√≠ como asesores externos para asegurar la alineaci√≥n y cumplimiento de los objetivos estrat√©gicos de la empresa.

‚Ä¢ Escalabilidad: Garantizar que los modelos y soluciones desarrolladas sean escalables y adaptables a diversas industrias.

‚Ä¢ Investigaci√≥n y Desarrollo: Mantenerse actualizado con las √∫ltimas tendencias y avances en IA y ciencia de datos, y aplicarlos para mejorar nuestros productos y servicios.

‚Ä¢ Cumplimiento Normativo: Asegurar que todos los modelos y soluciones cumplan con las regulaciones y est√°ndares (√©ticos) internacionales y otras normas pertinentes.

‚Ä¢ Liderazgo de personas: Liderar, guiar y desarrollar a los miembros del equipo, cuando los hubiere, en l√≠nea con los valores de la compa√±√≠a.







Requisitos del puesto:




‚Ä¢ Educaci√≥n: Ciencias de Datos, Ingenier√≠a, Matem√°ticas, Estad√≠stica, Inform√°tica o un campo relacionado.

‚Ä¢ Experiencia: M√≠nimo de 8 a√±os de experiencia en ciencia de datos o tecnolog√≠as de la informaci√≥n, con al menos 2 a√±os relacionados con IA y 3 a√±os en un rol de liderazgo.

‚Ä¢ Conocimientos T√©cnicos: Experiencia demostrable en el desarrollo y validaci√≥n de modelos de IA, incluyendo t√©cnicas de machine learning y deep learning.

‚Ä¢ Conocimientos Sectoriales: Relevantes a industria(/s) que sean o puedan ser clientes de Zertia: terminolog√≠a, procesos, tecnolog√≠as y riesgos relevantes de dicha industria, estructuras y governance de IA aplicable, pol√≠ticas y requisitos de negocio para la gesti√≥n de IA, c√≥digos de conducta y buenas pr√°cticas, Adem√°s, procesos, estructuras, governance, funciones, documentaci√≥n, jerarqu√≠as, monitorizaci√≥n, an√°lisis y evaluaci√≥n relacionada con la gesti√≥n de sistemas de gesti√≥n de inteligencia artificial (AIMS), procesos de gesti√≥n de riesgos (en particular, conocimiento de ISO/IEC 23894), seguridad de informaci√≥n y datos as√≠ como evaluaciones de riesgo e impacto vinculadas a gesti√≥n de IA (en particular, ISO/IEC 22989, ISO/IEC 5259-3, ISO/IEC TR 24027:2021, ISO/IEC CD 42005, as√≠ como ISO/IEC 27001 y, donde aplique, ISO/IEC 27701).

‚Ä¢ Regulaci√≥n de IA: Conocimiento profundo de las regulaciones de IA, particularmente el EU IA Act y normativas similares en Estados Unidos y el Reino Unido.

‚Ä¢ Habilidades de Liderazgo: Capacidad para liderar y gestionar equipos multidisciplinarios, fomentar la colaboraci√≥n y promover una cultura de innovaci√≥n.

‚Ä¢ Habilidades de Comunicaci√≥n: Excelentes habilidades de comunicaci√≥n verbal y escrita, con capacidad para explicar conceptos t√©cnicos complejos a audiencias no t√©cnicas.

‚Ä¢ Pensamiento Estrat√©gico: Visi√≥n estrat√©gica para alinear los desarrollos tecnol√≥gicos con los objetivos comerciales de la empresa.

‚Ä¢ Idiomas: Fluidez en ingl√©s y espa√±ol.

‚Ä¢ Proactividad y Autonom√≠a: Capacidad para trabajar de manera independiente con m√≠nima supervisi√≥n, siendo proactivo en la identificaci√≥n y resoluci√≥n de problemas relacionados con la gesti√≥n de la informaci√≥n.

‚Ä¢ Afinidad Tecnol√≥gica: inter√©s por las nuevas √°reas de conocimiento. En particular, tecnolog√≠as disruptivas, IA generativa, etc.

‚Ä¢ Actitud: proactiva y orientada a resultados, con un enfoque en la calidad y la eficiencia.

‚Ä¢ Cooperaci√≥n: Tienes una capacidad demostrada para navegar y forjar relaciones con terceros.

‚Ä¢ Adaptaci√≥n: Eres capaz de adaptarte r√°pidamente en un entorno de startup din√°mico, aportando ideas frescas e innovadoras.




Qu√© ofrecemos:




Salario competitivo: seg√∫n experiencia.

Impacto global y crecimiento: participa en proyectos a gran escala que redefinen industrias con clientes internacionales y de r√°pido crecimiento.

Cultura: trabaja con autonom√≠a y colabora con un equipo amigable en un entorno de pol√≠tica de puertas abiertas y disfruta de eventos de equipo.

Otros: 23 d√≠as de vacaciones, ticket restaurante y seguro m√©dico










Te animamos a postularte incluso si crees que no cumples con todos los requisitos. No todos los mejores candidatos cumplen con cada una de las calificaciones enumeradas. Si te apasiona la IA, cumples con gran parte de los requisitos anteriores y quieres unirte a una startup en r√°pido crecimiento, post√∫late a esta oportunidad √∫nica.




Adem√°s, en Zertia nos comprometemos a crear un entorno de trabajo inclusivo y diverso. Creemos firmemente que la diversidad de experiencias, perspectivas y antecedentes es una fuente de fortaleza y enriquecimiento para nuestra comunidad laboral. Nos esforzamos por construir un equipo que refleje una variedad de identidades y experiencias, y fomentamos activamente la igualdad de oportunidades en todos nuestros procesos de reclutamiento y desarrollo profesional. Por ello, invitamos a candidatos de todos los or√≠genes a unirse a nosotros en nuestro compromiso de fomentar un ambiente de trabajo inclusivo y diverso.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer - LLM
Description:
LLM - Python for Machine Learning

Experience: 2 - 15 Years

Location- Permanent Remote Anywhere in the world

Contract Duration: 6 Months

Opportunity- Full Time, 8 hours, 5 hours Mandatory overlap with PST

Total Years Of exp- 2+ years Mandatory

Mandatory Skills- Python: min 2 years, Python for Data Science: min 1 yr, Machine Learning: min 1 yr, PyTorch: min 1 yr, Keras: min 1 yr, Tensorflow: min 1 yr

Key skills: Python, ML, PyTorch, Keras, TensorFlow

Job Responsibilities


Develop, train, and deploy machine learning models using TensorFlow and/or PyTorch.
Implement machine learning models and preprocessing pipelines using Scikit-learn.
Apply supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, including SVM, Decision Trees, Random Forest, and k-NN, to solve complex problems.
Design and implement deep learning architectures such as CNNs, RNNs, GANs, and transfer learning models.
Explore and apply reinforcement learning techniques to enhance AI solutions.


Job Requirements


Bachelor‚Äôs/Master‚Äôs degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
At least 2+ years of experience as a Python-focused Engineer.
1+ years of experience with Python-based frameworks for machine learning.
Proficiency in TensorFlow and/or PyTorch for model development and deployment.
Strong knowledge of Scikit-learn for machine learning model implementation.
In-depth understanding of supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, as well as deep learning architectures.


Nice To Have


Experience with Keras for quick prototyping of deep learning models.
Proficiency in Pandas and Numpy for data manipulation and preprocessing.
Familiarity with Large Language Models (LLMs) and their applications in AI.
Excellent spoken and written English communication skills.


Skills: data science,large language models (llms),reinforcement learning,ai,unsupervised learning,pandas,gans,machine learning,deep learning,transfer learning,scikit-learn,supervised learning,rnns,decision trees,k-nn,keras,svm,pytorch,random forest,tensorflow,python,learning,ml,cnns,algorithms,numpy

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
A key client of ours is looking to launch a new product that will be born out of Madrid and we are looking for the individual who will lead it.




Focusing on the Spanish power market initially before expanding out to other European countries, we are looking for individuals who have strong Spanish power market knowledge, specifically, an understanding of the grid, demand forecasting, grid optimisation and power flow modelling. The large data models are in Python so very strong knowledge of Python is key.




If you would like to learn more, apply now.
